spatial_accuracy.notes: Major layout mismatches vs plan: (E2/E4) Dining Room is not clearly separated in the 3D (plan shows a distinct dining space with a curved/angled boundary and exterior window run). (E2/E4) Kitchen footprint and perimeter wall breaks do not match the plan’s stepped right-side exterior and the kitchen/playroom separation line. (E2/E3) Several interior door locations/orientations don’t correspond to the 2D door swings (notably the kitchen–dining connection and the small service spaces near foyer/WC). (E2) Window positions and counts differ on multiple exterior walls (large multi-panel windows in 3D do not align with the plan’s segmented window layout).

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency and enclosure fidelity issues: (E1) Pantry shown in plan (center) is not clearly represented as an enclosed room with correct access. (E2) Foyer/closet/WC cluster geometry is simplified and does not preserve the plan’s wall jogs and closet layout. (E5) Extra/unsupported exterior door configuration appears in 3D (prominent double-door on right/front side is not clearly indicated in the plan). Wall thickness is generally consistent, but several walls are shifted/straightened relative to the plan’s offsets.

furniture_mapping.notes: (E2/E4) Kitchen cabinetry/island arrangement is generic and does not follow the plan’s exact counter runs and sink placements. (E1) Dining furniture is missing despite dining room being a key defined space in plan. (E2) Fireplace element is present in 3D but is not indicated on the provided 2D plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric render with coherent lighting and generally good geometry. Minor issues: some openings (doors/windows) look inconsistently sized and the camera feels slightly more perspective than strict orthographic isometric.

detected_errors.description: Pantry (center of plan) is not clearly modeled as a dedicated enclosed room with a matching doorway.
Dining room as a distinct enclosed/defined space is effectively missing/merged into the open area in the 3D.
Kitchen/playroom boundary and right-side exterior wall stepping do not match the 2D plan’s wall breaks and room limits.
Foyer/closet/WC suite geometry and placements are simplified and do not match the plan’s wall alignment and closet configuration.
Multiple door placements/orientations (swing/hinge side and position) differ from the 2D plan, especially around kitchen–dining and the small service rooms.
Window positions and groupings are inconsistent with the 2D plan (notably large multi-panel windows in the 3D that do not align to the plan’s segmented window layout).
Room proportions are altered: the dining zone and central open area appear enlarged/reshaped relative to the plan’s more articulated boundaries.
Prominent double exterior door on the right/front side appears unsupported by the 2D plan.
Fireplace element appears in the 3D but is not indicated on the provided 2D plan.
